Next, we need to consider the timing of college commencements. Most college commencements take place in late spring or early summer when temperatures are generally warmer.

In some regions, particularly those at higher altitudes or northern latitudes, it is not uncommon to see frost during the late spring or early summer. 

Therefore, the answer is (A) yes, it is common to see frost during some college commencements, particularly in colder regions.
